description: Library and/or survey based project or laboratory project involving research and analysis of a specific topic in biotechnology. The area of work may be the technology or business of biotechnology. Students completing the course over two semesters must enrol in BIOT7000 if commencing in sem 1 and finishing sem 2; BIOT7002 if commencing in sem 2 and finishing sem 1; BIOT7019 if commencing in sem 2 and finishing in summer semester; BIOT7004 if commencing in summer semester and finishing in sem 1. Students completing the course in a single semester must enrol in BIOT7003 or BIOT7012.
